Name: Nether Globe
LongDescription: Prevents Ghost-type moves from damaging Ghost-type Pokémon. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Ghost-type Pokémon.  You can get a Nether Globe at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Purple Silk, a Shady Dust, and a Shadow Gem. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
